Steve Ballmer says SharePoint lets more business users in an organization publish content to the Web without having to involve IT. Marketing, sales, customer service people desire to move things along quickly, and without necessarily on every transaction having IT involved. SharePoint is a great bridge for that, said Steve Ballmer in an interview with InformationWeek. of Evansville political science professor. If Mike Pence is to encounter any bumps at all, they could come early, as he shifts his focus from federal to state issues, Robert Dion said. In some cases, it can be an awkward transition, to go from being a lawmaker to an executive, and to go from the federal level to the state level. There's going to be that transition that might have a few hiccups to it, he said.`` But he's familiar with all the issues, he's an energetic campaigner, he's got solid conservative credentials, he knows how to raise money.''
